mapper.select: SELECT t1.ID_, t1.TYPE_ AS type, t1.TIME_ AS time, t1.USER_ID_ AS userId, t2.FIRST_ AS userName, -- t1.TASK_ID_ AS taskId, (case t1.TYPE_ when 'TJ' THEN 'START' ELSE t1.TASK_ID_ END ) AS taskId, -- t3.NAME_ AS taskName, (case t1.TYPE_ when 'TJ' THEN '流程提交' ELSE t3.NAME_ END ) AS taskName, t1.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processInstanceId, t1.MESSAGE_ AS message --,CONVERT (FULL_MSG_ USING utf8) AS fullMsg FROM act_hi_comment t1 INNER JOIN act_id_user t2 ON t1.USER_ID_ = t2.ID_ LEFT JOIN act_hi_taskinst t3 ON t3.ID_ = t1.TASK_ID_ WHERE t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{value} and ACTION_='AddComment' ORDER BY t1.TIME_ ASC
